meanings.type: Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. operation (of a machine); running; working 現在５０台の機械が運転中です。Fifty of the machines are running at the present time.
2. driving (a vehicle) キャロルはレンタカーを運転しています。Carol is driving a rent-a-car.
3. use (of capital, funds, etc.); management; investment 君は資金をうまく運転しなくてはならない。You must employ your capital well.

sentences.translation: Fifty of the machines are running at the present time.
You must employ your capital well.
